verses.name: 1 Samuel 13:9
verses.text: And Saul said, Bring hither a burnt offering to me, and peace offerings. And he offered the burnt offering.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 13:10
verses.text: And it came to pass, that as soon as he had made an end of offering the burnt offering, behold, Samuel came; and Saul went out to meet him, that he might salute him.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 13:11
verses.text: And Samuel said, What hast thou done? And Saul said, Because I saw that the people were scattered from me, and that thou camest not within the days appointed, and that the Philistines gathered themselves together at Michmash;
